dublin_core.dcvalue: Derek Ritz Principal at ecGroup Inc gave this presentation at the May 5 Deep Dive meeting of the mHealth Working Group This presentation discusses the OpenHIE community a group dedicated to improving health of the underserved through the open collaborative development and support of country driven large scale health information sharing architectures
The Open Health Information Exchange (OpenHIE) Community: A broad, multi-stakeholder community supporting interoperable health information structures
